name: Add the links shortened by lc.cxÂ to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time there is a new link shortened in lc.cx, Make will automatically add a row containing link and additional information to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vQDFBLhgyHOmvfyMtk9bPrTGqNNX79I8Um2Hssp90OU/edit?usp=sharing).
